SELECT count, cr_at AS created_at FROM (SELECT SUM(count) AS count, DATE_TRUNC('hour', created_at) AS cr_at FROM dns_stat_10sec_all WHERE created_at >= date_trunc('second',(#{date_start}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE)) AND DATE date_trunc('second',(#{date_end}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE)) + INTERVAL '1 day' >= created_at GROUP BY cr_at ORDER BY cr_at ASC) AS dns;

SELECT count, cr_at AS created_at FROM (SELECT SUM(count) AS count, DATE_TRUNC('hour', created_at) AS cr_at FROM ddos_stat_10sec_all WHERE created_at >= date_trunc('second',(#{date_start}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE)) AND DATE date_trunc('second',(#{date_end}::TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE)) + INTERVAL '1 day' >= created_at GROUP BY cr_at ORDER BY cr_at ASC) AS ddos;

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(count),0) AS count, EXTRACT('week' FROM days) AS created_at FROM GENERATE_SERIES(#{date_start}, DATE #{date_end} + INTERVAL '0 day','1 day'::INTERVAL) AS days LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_TRUNC('day',created_at) AS cr_at, SUM(count) AS count FROM dns_stat_1day_distinct WHERE created_at >= #{date_start} AND DATE #{date_end} >= created_at GROUP BY cr_at ) AS dns_stat ON DATE_TRUNC('day',cr_at) = days GROUP BY created_at ORDER BY created_at asc;
